original_text: His head and his hair were white like sheep's hair. They were very white, like snow. His eyes were like fires that were burning brightly.
korean_text: 그의 머리와 털의 희기가 흰 양털 같고 눈 같으며 그의 눈은 불꽃 같고

sentences.original_text: His head and his hair were white like sheep's hair
They were very white, like snow
His eyes were like fires that were burning brightly
